text:
Now that the model has been ﬁt, we can make a prediction. A prediction can be made by
calling the predict() function and passing it either an interval of dates or indices relative to
the training data. We will use indices starting with the ﬁrst time step beyond the training data
and extending it six more days, giving a total of a seven day forecast period beyond the training
dataset.
# make forecast
yhat = model_fit.predict(len(series), len(series)+6)
